name: Intel Core i7 4790 4th Gen 8MB Smart Cache 3.6 GHz Processor
description: Intel Core i7 4790 4th generation processor has 3.6 GHz speed, maximum turbo frequency 4GHz, 8-megabyte smart cache memory, conflict-free, Intel quick sync video, Intel InTru 3D technology, Intel wireless display, secure key.

name: MSI H61M-P31 DDR3 Desktop Motherboard
description: Dual memory channel, 100 MHz base clock, 1600 MHz supported with Intel Ivy Bridge processor, 16GB maximum storage, base clock / hyper transport chipset, 1 DVI, 2 DIMM slots, 4 SATAII, 3 audio ports.

name: Juhor DDR4 8GB RAM
description: 8GB memory capacity, faster burst access speeds for data throughput, 100% tested / RoHS, easy to install-plug-and-play functionality, PCB material, 1.2V working voltage, 13.4 x 3.1 x 0.1cm dimension.

name: WD Purple 8TB Surveillance Video Recording Hard Drive
description: Western Digital WD81PURZ surveillance video recording hard drive has 8 TB storage, ideal HDD for CCTV recording, 3.5 x 1 / 3H form factor, SATA 6Gb/s interface, 64 MB buffer size.

name: AData XPG SX6000 Pro M.2 512GB PCIe SSD
description: This AData XPG SX6000 SSD interfaces to the host through a PCIe 3.0 x 4 link and communicates using the NVMe 1.3 protocol. It can deliver a read/write speed of up to 2100 / 1500 Mbps, and its random 4K performance can reach up to 250000 / 240000 IOPS read / write.

name: Gigabyte GT 710 2GB DDR3 Memory 954MHz Graphics Card
description: Gigabyte GT 710 graphics card has 2 GB DDR3 memory, 64-bit memory interface, Nvidia GeForce GT 710 graphics engine, 954 MHz core clock speed, size 21 x 144 x 68 mm, memory clock v2.0 1600 MHz / v1.0 1800 MHz, supports PCI express 2.0 x 8 bus interface.
